wikipedia_page.main: Robert Craig McLean (17 February 1879 – 24 October 1936) was a Scottish professional footballer. After initially playing in Scotland, McLean moved to Millwall in 1904 and later joined Newcastle United and finally Southampton, before returning to his home country to finish his playing career. He played primarily as a half-back.

response: *Robert McLean (minister) (1846–1926, American Presbyterian minister and legislator
